B

Block - Class in main.models
A Block class that represents a block in a blockchain system.
Block(String) - Constructor for class main.models.Block
Constructs a new Block object with the given address and sets the time to the current time.
Block(List<Coin>, String, Long) - Constructor for class main.models.Block
Constructs a new Block object with the given inputs, address, and amount, and sets the time to the current time.
BlockChain - Class in main.models
The BlockChain class represents a blockchain, which is a distributed ledger of blocks that are linked together This class manages a list of Block objects that represent individual blocks in the chain.
BlockChain(List<Block>) - Constructor for class main.models.BlockChain
Constructs a new blockchain with the specified list of blocks.
BlockChainService - Class in main.services
This class provides functionality to find the address with the maximum inbound volume within a specified time interval in a given blockchain.
BlockChainService() - Constructor for class main.services.BlockChainService
